entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
